base_description: Rectangular desk with a checkered pattern, modern style.
part_description: The desk has a flat top with a checkered design, two side panels, and three shelves on the left. The right side has an open design with vertical supports.
internal_interaction_description: The flat top connects to the side panels, providing stability. Shelves on the left are attached to the side panel, offering storage space. The right side's vertical supports ensure balance and support for the desk's surface.
external_interaction_description: The desk serves as a workspace, allowing placement of items like computers or books on top. The shelves can hold smaller items or documents. Its modern design fits well in contemporary office or home settings, interacting aesthetically with surrounding furniture.
